title: Nothing after play button
body:
Hey, I've been trying to get into the login screen for the past hour. When I open the patcher and it finishes loading, after clicking on the play button the launcher starts loading and then it just closes itself. 
I hope someone can help... :/

replies.body:
Do any error messages appear? What events exactly transpire, or is it exactly as you described?

What OS are you on? Have you made sure to update all your systems and graphics drivers?
this is happening to me as well
